a11y.priceAmountShoppingCart: {{item}} items. Total price for this item: ¥{{price}}.
a11y.qrCode: Scan the QR Code by holding up your phone to the top-left of the screen. Make sure screen curtain is turned off.

loginCta.title: Log in to unlock more features!
loginCta.message: Log in to use Pay Later, view your order history, and earn points! Currently only available to BAID students and faculty.

storeClosedModal.title: Store Closed
storeClosedModal.message: The store is currently closed. You can still view the menu, but you cannot place an order.
storeClosedModal.messageScheduledA: The store is currently closed. You can still view the menu, but you cannot place an order. The store will reopen at {{time}}.
storeClosedModal.messageScheduledB: The store is currently closed. You can still view the menu, but you cannot place an order. The store will reopen on the next weekday at {{time}}.

maximumCupsModal.title: Capacity Reached
maximumCupsModal.simple: The store has reached its maximum capacity for orders.
maximumCupsModal.message: The store has reached its maximum capacity for orders. You can still view the menu, but you cannot place an order.

payLaterModal.title: Order Not Paid
payLaterModal.message: You have a Pay Later order that has not been paid yet. Please pay for it before placing a new order.

maximumCupsPerOrder_one: You can only order {{count}} cup at a time.
maximumCupsPerOrder_other: You can only order {{count}} cups at a time.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.loadingText: Please wait while we process your order. This may take up to 30 seconds.
checkout.loginNag: You can pay with Balance and Pay Later after you <1>log in</1>.
checkout.onSiteNag: You can pay with cash by ordering on-site.
checkout.balanceDisabled: You have insufficient balance to pay for this order.
checkout.payLaterDisabled: You have a Pay Later order that has not been paid yet.
checkout.couponTooBig: Coupon value (¥{{original}}) exceeds total price. The remaining value will be lost.

loginNagModal.title: You will not receive points for this order
loginNagModal.message: You are not logged in, and you will not receive points for this order. Would you like to log in now? Currently only available to BAID students and faculty.

wechatPay.title: Weixin Pay
wechatPay.scan: Please use WeChat to scan the QR code below.
wechatPay.processing: Please wait while we are processing your payment.
wechatPay.shareTitle: Help me pay for my order at Whale Cafe
wechatPay.shareText: I need help paying for my order at Whale Cafe. Can you help me out?
wechatPay.mobile: You will be redirected to WeChat to complete the payment.

waitTime.done_pickUp: Your order is ready for pickup!
waitTime.done_delivery: Your order is on its way!
waitTime.finePrint: Time is an estimate and may vary.

details.orderNumberPrompt: Please remember your order number. You will need it when picking up.
details.contactPrompt: Please contact Li Jiarui if you have any questions or need a refund. WebArtistry is not responsible for Whale Cafe's operations.
details.pickUpPrompt: You must pick up your order at the counter in the lobby. <1>You will NOT be refunded if you do not pick up.</1>
details.paymentPromptPayLater: This Pay Later order hasn't been paid for yet.
details.paymentPrompt: This order hasn't been paid for yet. This order will not start until you pay.
details.refundTip: Please contact us if you need a refund.
details.paymentMethodMessage: How would you like to pay for this order?
